attributes.review:
Bad. Awful. Terrible. Disappointing. Disgusting. Irresponsible. Disrespectful. Pointless. Offensive. Misleading. 
Those are a few words I would use to summarize this app. A bad, awful, terrible, disappointing, disgusting, irresponsible, disrespectful, pointless, offensive, and misleading app. 
This app is also slow. It’s full of spam and fake news. I came here for a president and walked away with a headache. 
Delete this app for the love of all other apps that came before it. Sacrifice this app to the gods and bring back flappy bird. It’s a far better upgrade.
attributes.title: I Hate This App.

attributes.review: As a political enthusiast myself, I had to see what the rave was about for trump’s app. In my political beliefs, the president represents America (periodt💅🏼) and I wanted to see what trump’s personal philosophy was. Needless to say, I was DOWN RIGHT OUTRAGED 🤬😤by the audacity this man had 😡. Bunkerboy really said ENTITLEMENT 😝 But at least he led us FIRST PLACE in the covid pandemic 👁👄👁. world powers?? don’t you mean the US? I mean, if we don’t test for cases, then we don’t have cases right? 👀 this app not just RUINED my experience as iphone user BUT AS A HUMAN TOO😒🔫. like can this app get even more APPALLING??? I usually don’t write such things but this app STOOD OUT😳. she really put the bad and die in BADDIE 😩🧚🏼‍♂️✨💖 like keep it up KWEEN😘💅🏼. It was such a horrible and flabbergasting experience to witness what this child had to say on the app. I’m at a lost for words honestly, NOTHING 😡could describe the horrible experience i had.
attributes.title: one word- DISAPPOINTING!!!

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded. This app took up so much space on my phone. It lagged so much I couldn’t believe it. I can not believe that our president has such an unreliable and slow app. Every time I tried to do anything in the app an ad would pop up.
